719769f-a.title: Manhattan: Forsyth Street - Grand Street
719769f-a.text:
85-83 Forsyth Street, adjoining and south of the S.W. corner of Grand
Street. Shown is the Grand Lyceum Palaoe, 2n assembly hall.
July 18, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
719769f-a.folder: Forsyth Street & Grand Street, Manhattan, NY

719770f-a.title: Manhattan: Forsyth Street - Grand Street
719770f-a.folder: Forsyth Street & Grand Street, Manhattan, NY

720088f-a.title: Manhattan: Grand Street - Forsyth Street
720088f-a.text:
Grand Street, north side, west from and including Forsyth Street,
to the Bowery.  No. 272 Grand Street, at the N.E. corner of Forsyth
Street, and No. 270 Grand Street, at the N.W. corner of Forsyth Street,
are frame houseS.
July 18, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
720088f-a.folder: Grand Street & Forsyth Street, Manhattan, NY

719771f-a.title: Manhattan: Forsyth Street - Grand Street
719771f-a.text:
Forsyth Street, at, adjoining and south of the S.E. corner of Grand Street.
October 12, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
719771f-a.folder: Forsyth Street & Grand Street, Manhattan, NY

719772f-a.title: Manhattan: Forsyth Street - Grand Street
719772f-a.text:
Forsyth Street, east side, north from Grand,to and including Broome
Streets. The 3-story building, No. 272 Grand Street, at the N.E. corner of
Foreyth Street, is a frame house. Clearance in the foreground, will event-
ually be the Sarah Delano Roosevelt Park.
October 12, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
719772f-a.folder: Forsyth Street & Grand Street, Manhattan, NY

720090f-c.title: Manhattan: Grand Street - Forsyth Street
720090f-c.text:
(1)
00rand Street, south side, we3f from and including Forsyth Street,
to and including the Bowery. The Third Ave., Elevated is shown
on the Bowery.
August 1, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A view of Nos. 271.273 Grand Street, at and adjoining the S.E.
corner of Forsyth Street, as shown in the foreground of No. 1.
August 1, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The same as No. 1, at a later date and showing the demolition
of the Grand Theatre, Grand Street, at the S.E. corner of
Chrystie Street, as seen through clearance for Roosevelt Park.
NE6 ~~ 2757  AuEust 30, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
720090f-c.folder: Grand Street & Forsyth Street, Manhattan, NY

720091f-a.title: Manhattan: Grand Street - Forsyth Street
720091f-a.text:
272-282 Grand Street, at, adjoining, and east of the N.E. corner
of Forsyth Street. No. 272 is a 3-story frame house with a brick front.
The view also shows 92-100 Forsyth Street, at, adjoining, and north of
the N.E. corner of Grand Street. No. 92 is a frame house with a
brick front.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 393.
720091f-a.folder: Grand Street & Forsyth Street, Manhattan, NY

720092f-a.title: Manhattan: Grand Street - Forsyth Street
720092f-a.text:
Grand Street, at the N.W. corner of Forsyth Street and the new Sarah
DDelano Roosevelt Park under construction, between Chrystie (left) and Forsyth
(right) Streets.
October 20, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
720092f-a.folder: Grand Street & Forsyth Street, Manhattan, NY
